backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing admin/user authentication, accounts, sessions, and basic access control state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries describing the purpose of key frontend pages, components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables, dark mode colors, and base styling applied across the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app with updated TelsFX title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, global background layout, query client, transitions, and root providers.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerNotice: Alert component displaying a prominent disclaimer about non-affiliation with referenced companies.
frontend/src/components/GreenSectionCard: Reusable card component with emerald‑to‑teal gradient styling that supports standard div props.
frontend/src/components/HeaderHamburgerM: Mobile hamburger menu providing navigation through a sliding sheet with transition-aware routing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileTile.tsx: Profile tile showing avatar, name, optional title, and optional placeholder badge.
frontend/src/components/RouteTransitionO: Fullscreen loading overlay displayed during route transitions via useRouteTransition.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, legal links, recognition section, and branding.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Renders the site header with logo navigation and a hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/UsersWorldwideKp: Displays an animated KPI showing total users worldwide using account statistics.
frontend/src/config/admin.ts: Empty configuration file for admin settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminReveal.tsx: Empty hook file reserved for admin reveal logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Handles admin login, session validation, token storage, and logout using react-query and the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains react-query hooks for account creation, login, statistics, account listing, and user profile retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteTransition.ts: Implements a route transition context with delayed navigation and spinner state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme CSS variables, dark mode variants, global typography, custom scrollbar, and a fixed vector background layer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPlansPage.tsx: Renders plan selection UI with pricing, features, and navigation logic for signup and login flows.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersPage.tsx: Admin page enforcing session checks and displaying a table of user accounts with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section, mission overview, KPIs, and navigation to partnership plans.
frontend/src/pages/PlanLoginPage.tsx: Login page for plan-based flows with validation, session flag checks, and post-login routing to the profit page.
frontend/src/pages/PlanPostSignupPage.ts: Displays a welcome page after signup showing plan-specific profit and product details based on the selected plan.
frontend/src/pages/PlanProfitPage.tsx: Shows main and extra profit details for a selected plan, resolving the plan tier from URL or session storage.
frontend/src/pages/PlanSignupPage.tsx: Provides a signup form with validation and account creation tied to a selected plan tier.
frontend/src/pages/PlanSuccessPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for future plan success content.
frontend/src/pages/PlanTelegramPage.tsx: Displays instructions and a button for users to join the project's Telegram channel.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders a scrollable privacy policy detailing data collection, usage, and disclosure practices.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists product categories with descriptions and features related to sustainable technology solutions.
frontend/src/pages/TelegramPage.tsx: Renders a standalone Telegram CTA page with branding, descriptive text, and a button linking to the official Telegram community.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the Terms & Conditions page with scrollable sections inside a styled card layout.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorMessage.t: Normalizes backend errors into clean user-facing messages with specific handling for known and network-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin integrations for the project.
project_state.json: Stores the project state, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for ongoing development.
